# key

## Summary

A key used in a generic key-value pair.


## Description

A key used in generic a key-value pair.
A key-value pair can be used to implement a dictionary which associates a key with a value.


## Metadata

    - name: key
    - Nature: DataProperty
    - Range: xsd:string
